Piano-themed escape room: Create an immersive experience where participants are transported into a world of music and sound. The room is designed to resemble a grand piano, with various elements and puzzles inspired by the instrument. Participants must use their problem-solving skills to unlock the secrets of the piano and escape the room before time runs out.

Piano-themed board game: Develop a board game that incorporates elements of music theory and piano playing. Players take on the role of piano students, navigating through a series of challenges and obstacles to become the ultimate piano master. The game includes various mini-games and activities, such as scales, arpeggios, and chord progressions, that players must complete to progress through the game.

Piano-themed cooking class: Host a cooking class that focuses on dishes inspired by the piano. Participants learn how to prepare dishes named after famous piano pieces, such as "Moonlight Sonata Sorbet" or "Rhapsody in Blue Ravioli." The class also includes a piano performance element, where participants can showcase their own piano skills or listen to a professional pianist perform.

Piano-themed scavenger hunt: Create a scavenger hunt that takes participants on a musical journey through the piano. Participants must find and collect items related to the piano, such as piano keys, sheet music, and music-themed souvenirs. The scavenger hunt ends at a secret location, where participants can enjoy a piano performance by a professional pianist.

Piano-themed virtual reality experience: Develop a virtual reality experience that allows users to step inside a grand piano and explore its inner workings. Users can learn about the different parts of the piano, such as the keys, hammers, and strings, and even play a virtual piano using VR controllers. The experience also includes interactive elements, such as a virtual piano teacher that provides lessons and feedback on the user's playing.
